attributes.action: Stop strip search of under 16 year old by police without permission of guardians
attributes.additional_details: The link to this article is http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-37801760
attributes.background: I have recently read an article about a 12 year old child being stripped searched by police and I guarantee the child was scared to death about it and she had no support by parents because they didn't even know

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
